home-page.sentence: The way to ensure business activity grows, starts with a stable management quality system

about-page.p1: My name is Sharon Lihod, I am Senior Quality Manager, Over 30 years of experience, with proven track record in leading Quality policy, Quality Systems,which comply with global standards.
about-page.p2: Leading Quality processes in compliance with Aierospace, Automotive, Medical Device, Environment, and IPC standards.
about-page.p3: Certified Lead Auditor for IATF16949, ISO9001-2015, ISO13485 2016. Experience in international regulation: UL, IPC , REACH, ROHS,CMRT.
about-page.p4: Certified IPC 610 CIT -Electronic assemblies specialist. IPC6012/6013/ 600 CIS.
about-page.p5: Experiance with SMT & WAVE soldering Production's processes.
about-page.p6: Execute external ,and internal Audits, preparing the organization to comply with ISO 9001-2015 standards.
about-page.p7: Defining corrective and preventive actions,Failures Analysing , Training Employees.
about-page.p8: Management skills: high performance, proactivity, professional integrity, wide perspective, great communication with people.

experience.p1: The Quality field is a very interesting, challenging , touches every field in the organization, therefore a lot of experience is required to operate an effective quality system in the organization , and it does not matter what the organization deals with.
experience.p2: I started my way in the Quality field in the Air Force for 12 years , Period which required discipline, precision , and high level of performance without compromise.
experience.p3: In the last 25 years, I have been worked in large organizations in the Israeli industry, I have gained a lot of experience in quality management in a wide variety of fields, establishment of quality management systems, training and induction of employees, performance's improvements , failure's investigations, risk management, supplier's monitoring , supplier's audits in Israel and abroad , preparation of organizations for external autids, and for internal audits , and more...
experience.p4: The Major guiding line for me, in managing a quality system, is the PDCA method: PLAN, DO, CHECK, ACT to bring the organization to a state of continuous learning, effective learning, constant correction and improvement , in order to improve and optimize the quality system, and bring the organization to better operational performances throughout time.
experience.p5: It is a proven fact that managing an effective quality system, no matter how many people work in the organization ,and whether it is a large or small organization, improves the level of performances of the organization, reduces the costs of non-quality , and improves customer's satisfaction!
experience.p6: I would be happy to contribute from my experience in consulting for the management of the quality system in your organization, or in the establishment of a new quality system and assistance in ongoing maintenance, both for the external certification of the certification bodies, or for the needs of improving and streamlining the internal systems.
